channel.title: Weapon problem
channel.description: When using a dragon scimitar on lung it trains att/str/def rather than just str. The attack emote is also a poke rather then a slash. I've looked in combatassistant.java player.java playerassistant.java you name it I can't seem to find where to change the exp gained. I have a couple of other weapons like this to, but if I can figure out how to do the d scim I'm sure I can figure out the rest. Thanks.

item.title: Weapon problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

1 2 3 4 KOED:

So what you’re saying is to click the “lung” on the d scim and get the actionbuttion ID and find it in clickingbuttons.java and make sure it’s in the correct spot in order for it to get the correct experience? Same goes for the other attack methods as well.

That’d be correct.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Print out the actionButtonId to the server console from the ClickingButtons class, and then search in the ClickingButtons class for the numbers that were printed. If you get 0 results, well… that’s your issue.

If you can’t find it, search for:

			c.fightMode = 0;

You should find the other buttons with a bunch of comments on what is what…
Add your cases accordingly.

If you do find it:
Make sure the fightMode is correct.
0 = attack
1 = def
2 = str
3 = controlled (all)

Read full topic
